definitions.meaning: 恢复旧的、不良的习惯或行为，尤其是道德或宗教上的退步
definitions.usage: 通常用在描述一个人在改掉不良习惯或追求进步后，又回到原来的不良状态，特别是在道德、宗教或个人自律方面。

examples.scene: 小明在戒烟半年后，因为工作压力大，开始偷偷抽烟。他觉得自己又回到了老路上。
examples.chineseIdea: 在戒烟的努力后，小明因为压力重新开始抽烟，觉得自己退步了。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: After months of staying clean, Xiao Ming started to @ @ @ due to work stress.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: After months of staying clean, Xiao Ming started to 「backslide into old habits」 due to work stress.
examples.chineseTranslation: 在保持了几个月的清爽后，小明因为工作压力开始「退回到老习惯」。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'He go back to smoke.' 纠正：'He backslid into old habits of smoking.'

examples.scene: 小红在健身房坚持锻炼了一年后，因为忙于新工作，停止了运动，体重又开始增加。
examples.chineseIdea: 小红停止了健身努力，重新回到不健康的生活方式。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: Busy with her new job, Xiao Hong began to @ @ @ and gained weight again.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: Busy with her new job, Xiao Hong began to 「backslide into old habits」 and gained weight again.
examples.chineseTranslation: 忙于新工作，小红开始「退回到老习惯」，体重又增加了。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'She back to fat.' 纠正：'She backslid into old habits and gained weight.'

definitions.meaning: 在宗教信仰上退步或放弃原有的虔诚
definitions.usage: 常用于宗教语境，描述一个人在信仰上不再像以前那样虔诚，或重新回到不道德或不虔诚的行为。

examples.scene: 张伟在教会活动中非常活跃，但最近因为生活琐事，停止了祷告和参加礼拜，觉得自己离信仰越来越远。
examples.chineseIdea: 张伟因为生活忙碌，放弃了宗教活动，觉得自己不再虔诚。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: Overwhelmed by daily chores, Wei started to @ @ @ and stopped attending church.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: Overwhelmed by daily chores, Wei started to 「backslide in faith」 and stopped attending church.
examples.chineseTranslation: 被日常琐事压倒，伟开始「在信仰上退步」，不再去教堂。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'He no more believe.' 纠正：'He backslid in faith.'

examples.scene: 李娜在皈依宗教后严格遵守教规，但最近她开始质疑信仰，重新开始一些被禁止的行为。
examples.chineseIdea: 李娜放弃了宗教的严格要求，重新开始不被允许的行为。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: Questioning her beliefs, Na began to @ @ @ and ignored religious rules.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: Questioning her beliefs, Na began to 「backslide into sin」 and ignored religious rules.
examples.chineseTranslation: 质疑她的信仰，娜开始「退回到罪恶」，忽略了宗教规则。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'She do bad things again.' 纠正：'She backslid into sin.'

definitions.meaning: 在某方面的进步或成就上倒退
definitions.usage: 描述在学术、工作或其他领域的进步停滞或倒退，通常带有未能保持先前成就的含义。

examples.scene: 小刚在数学考试中一直进步，但最近因为分心玩游戏，他的成绩开始下降。
examples.chineseIdea: 小刚因为分心，数学成绩从进步变成了退步。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: Distracted by gaming, Gang started to @ @ @ in his math tests.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: Distracted by gaming, Gang started to 「backslide from progress」 in his math tests.
examples.chineseTranslation: 被游戏分心，刚开始在数学考试中「从进步中退步」。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'His math become bad.' 纠正：'He backslid from progress in math.'

examples.scene: 小丽在公司项目中表现出色，但最近因为缺乏动力，她的工作表现不再突出。
examples.chineseIdea: 小丽因为失去动力，工作表现从优秀变得平庸。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: Lacking motivation, Li began to @ @ @ at work.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: Lacking motivation, Li began to 「backslide in performance」 at work.
examples.chineseTranslation: 缺乏动力，丽开始在工作上「表现退步」。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'Her work not good now.' 纠正：'She backslid in performance at work.'
